      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isValidPassword(java.lang.String passwordString)
      isValidPassword method checks the validity of one password and return true if the password is valid and throw an exception if invalid.
      static boolean isWeakPassword(java.lang.String passwordString)
      isWeakPassword method checks for a “weak password”, i.e., one whose length is between 6 and 9, inclusive.
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> validPasswords(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> passwords)
      validPasswords method checks an ArrayList of passwords and return an ArrayList with the status of any invalid passwords (weak passwords are not considered invalid).

    • Method Detail

      • isValidPassword

        public static boolean isValidPassword(java.lang.String passwordString)
                               throws LengthException,
                                      NoDigitException,
                                      NoUpperAlphaException,
                                      NoLowerAlphaException,
                                      InvalidSequenceException
        isValidPassword method checks the validity of one password and return true if the password is valid and throw an exception if invalid.
        Parameters:
        passwordString - is String
        Returns:
        return true if the password is valid and throw an exception if invalid.
        Throws:
        LengthException - if password is less than 6 characters
        NoDigitException - if password contains no digit
        NoUpperAlphaException - if password contains no uppercase
        NoLowerAlphaException - if password contains no lowercase
        InvalidSequenceException - if password contains more than 2 of the same character in sequence

      • validPasswords

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> validPasswords(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> passwords)
        validPasswords method checks an ArrayList of passwords and return an ArrayList with the status of any invalid passwords (weak passwords are not considered invalid). The ArrayList of invalid passwords will be of the following format: password space message of exception thrown
        Parameters:
        passwords - String
        Returns:
        ArrayList of String invalidPasswords

      • isWeakPassword

        public static boolean isWeakPassword(java.lang.String passwordString)
        isWeakPassword method checks for a “weak password”, i.e., one whose length is between 6 and 9, inclusive. Do NOT throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        passwordString - String
        Returns:
        true if less than or equal to 9 characters and false otherwise
